com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.model

Interface Marker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMarker, CoordinatingMarker, JavaScriptMarker

    public interface Marker

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Marker.Icon
      Icon Required url - the url of the icon image Optional anchor - the point on the icon image which the marker will be positioned at.
      static class  Marker.Options
      Options Required: position - where to place the marker map - to contain the marker And one of: icon - an Icon object specifying icon parameters symbol - a Symbol object specifying symbol parameters Optional: clickable - whether or not this marker will generate click events draggable - whether or not this marker is draggable opacity - the opacity of the marker, from 0.0 to 1.0.
      static class  Marker.Symbol
      Symbol Required: path - the symbol's path, a custom path expressed in SVG path notation.
